title: The Last of the Old Time Shooting Sheriffs
A Matter of Life and Death
The End of Blackbeard the Pirate
How Charlie Faust Won a Pennant for the Giants
Honeymoon in Mexico
description: A newlywed couple comes to a small Mexican village to spend a year painting. After helping an orphaned child with an injury, they unexpectedly end up as his parents. Once word gets around, other kids beat a path to their door hoping also to be adopted.

title: Human Nature Through a Rear View Mirror
Mr. Pak Takes Over
description: This is the Korean War. Mr. Pak is a native interpreter. He is assigned to an American officer.

title: The Baron and His Uranium Killing
The Archer-Shee Case
description: A young cadet at Royal Navel College is accused of theft and dismissed.

title: The Voyage of Captain Tom Jones, Pirate
The Sad Death of a Hero
In the Eye of the Hurricane
Return from Oblivion
description: A businessman develops a persecution complex.

title: The Case of the Uncertain Hand
No Horse, No Wife, No Mustache
The Secret Weapon of Joe Smith
The Woman Who Changed Her Mind
Uncle Sam's C Men
description: Agents from the U.S. Commerce Department get a tip that a manufacturer is illegally shipping aircraft parts to Communist East Europe.

title: Down on the Tennessee
description: A young Northerner gets a job as first mate on a Tennessee River cargo boat, but discovers that the pilot is deaf, the fireman is a drunk and the cook is up to something shady.

title: Go Fight City Hall
description: An angry taxpayer in a suburban New York town finally gets fed up with the crooked and incompetent politicians running the local government and sets out to do something about it. However, the political machine doesn't scare so easily and they begin to make life miserable for the man and his family.

title: The Smuggler
description: A young Norwegian sailor on a ship bound for San Francisco runs afoul of a gang smuggling opium from Asia, which threatens to kill him if he doesn't smuggle drugs into the country for them when he lands in San Francisco.
